title: Merperson Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A mythical creature with the upper body of a huperson and the tail of a fish, depicted with a medium-light skin tone. Represents fantasy, the ocean, and magical beings.
apple_vendor_description: The merperson emoji on Apple devices is a captivating figure with a medium-light skin tone, featuring a shimmering, iridescent tail that catches the light with Apple's signature glossy 3D effect. Its flowing hair and graceful posture evoke a sense of myth and wonder, enhanced by the smooth gradients and soft rounded edges typical of Apple's design. This emoji often symbolizes dreams, fantasy, or a connection to the sea, adding a touch of magic to messages about imagination and escapism.
